tool.name: Stanford Standalone Part-of-Speech Tagger
tool.description: (standalone) Tokenize and add POS tags to unannotated text
tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds Tokens with Penn part-of-speech tags to a text in a LIF container using the `Stanford Core NLP tools <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/>`_.
**Required annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
* A LIF document with a single view containing `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ annotations to which a "pos" feature has been added indicating the token's part of speech (`Penn tagset <https://www.ling.upenn.edu/courses/Fall_2003/ling001/penn_treebank_pos.html>`_)
**License**
Stanford CoreNLP is licensed under `the GNU General Public License <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/#license>`_.
